string-array.name: ata
string-array.item:
ALL-STAR SQUADRON
Keyword(s): All-Star Squadron
Cost: 2
Characters using this team ability modify their attack value by +1 when making a close combat attack against a character at least twice its point value. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA modiﬁcan su valor de ataque en +1 cuando hacen un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo contra un personaje de al menos el doble de su valor de puntos.

ALPHA FLIGHT
Keyword(s): Alpha Flight
Cost: 4
Once during each game, choose any team ability or opposing character. Each friendly character using this team ability modifies its attack value by +1 when attacking the chosen character or a character possessing the chosen team ability. 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA sufre 2 o más daños por un ataque del oponente, coloca un contador de Hermandad en esta carta. Antes de realizar una acción no gratuita, una ﬁgura aliada que use este ATA puede retirar cualquier número de contadores de Hermandad para añadir +1 a su movimiento, ataque o rango, hasta ﬁnal de acción.

AMAZON
Keyword(s): Amazon
Cost: 4
Whenever a character using this team ability takes 2 or more damage from an opponent's attack, put a Sisterhood token on this card. Before being given a non-free action, a friendly character using this team ability may remove any number of Sisterhood tokens from this card. Modify that character's speed, attack, or range value by +1 for each token removed until that action is resolved. 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA sufre 2 o más daños por un ataque del oponente, coloca un contador de Hermandad en esta carta. Antes de realizar una acción no gratuita, una ﬁgura aliada que use este ATA puede retirar cualquier número de contadores de Hermandad para añadir +1 a su movimiento, ataque o rango, hasta ﬁnal de acción.

ANIMAL
 Keyword(s): Animal
 Cost: 4
 At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6. On a result of 5-6 all friendly characters using this team ability ignore Shape Change and Stealth this turn.

ANNIHILATORS
Keyword(s): Annihilators
Cost: 4
 When a character using this team ability KO's an opposing character of a higher point value with an attack, remove an action token from each friendly character using this team ability that's less points than the KO'd character. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA hace KO (con un ataque) a un personaje opuesto de mayor puntuación, rera un contador de acción de cada ﬁgura aliada usando este ATA que sea de menor puntuación que la ﬁgura KO.

ARKHAM ASYLUM\n Keyword(s): Arkham Asylum\n Cost: 4 At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 for all friendly characters using this team ability. Those characters can use the indicated power until your next turn. Uncopyable. 1–2 Plasticity 3–4 Leap/Climb 5–6 Phasing/Teleport

ASGARDIAN
 Keyword(s): Asgardian
 Cost: 5
 A character using this team ability can't have its Willpower or Indomitable countered. A character using this team ability can use Willpower on its first click. 

 A un personaje utilizando esta habilidad de equipo no se le puede cancelar ni Fuerza de Voluntad ni Indominable. Un personaje usando esta habilidad de equipo puede usar Fuerza de Voluntad en su primer click.

ATLANTIS
Keyword(s): Atlantis
Cost: 2
Whenever a character using this team ability occupies water terrain, modify its defense value by +1 against ranged combat attacks. 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA ocupa terreno acuático, modiﬁca su valor de defensa en +1 contra ataques a distancia.

AVENGERS (HEROIC AGE)
 Keyword(s): Avengers
 Cost: 2
 When a character using this team ability is given a move action, after actions resolve roll a d6 that can’t be rerolled. On a roll of 6, remove an action token from that character. 

 Cuando a un personaje usando este ATA se le da una acción de movimiento, después de que se resuelva tira 1d6 que no puede ser repetido. En un resultado de 6, retira un contador de acción de ese personaje.

AVENGERS RESPONSE UNIT
 Keyword(s): Avengers
 Cost: 3
 When one or more characters using this team ability is adjacent to a friendly character making a close combat attack, modify the characters attack value by +1. 

 Cuando uno o más personajes usando esta habilidad de equipo se encuentre adyacente a un personaje aliado haciendo un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, modiﬁca el valor de ataque del personaje en +1.

BATMAN FAMILY
 Keyword(s): Batman Family
 Cost: 4
 Characters using this team ability within 8 squares of a friendly character named "Batman" or "Bruce Wayne" can use Willpower. When not within 8 squares of a friendly character named "Batman" or "Bruce Wayne", characters using this team ability modify their speed and range values by +1.

BATMAN INC
 Keyword(s): Batman Inc
 Cost: 3
 At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character for all characters using this team ability. While any character using this team ability is on the map, whenever the sum of all modifiers applied to that opposing character's combat values is greater than +1, the sum of all modifiers is instead +1.

BIRDS OF PREY
 Keyword(s): Birds of Prey
 Cost: 1
 Once per turn, one friendly character using this team ability can use Support as a free action. When it does, it may only target a character with whom it shares a keyword and it subtracts 3 from the d6 roll instead of 2.

BLACK LANTERN CORPS
 Cost: 1
 Keyword(s): Black Lantern Corps
 When a character using this team ability uses Regeneration, its minimum result is 1.
 Uncopyable

CHECKMATE
Keyword(s): Checkmate
Cost: 6
Minion: Kings and Queens and Bishops
When another friendly character using this team ability and with a point value greater than 50 is within 8 squares, this character can be given a power action to use Perplex if it can't already use Perplex. 

Siervos: Reyes, reinas y alfiles
 Cuando otra ﬁgura aliada usando este ATA y con valor en puntos por encima de 50 está a 8 casillas, este personaje puede realizar una acción de poder para usar Perplex si no podía ulizarlo previamente.

DARK AVENGERS
Keyword(s): Dark Avengers
Cost: 4
Whenever an opposing character takes damage from an attack by a character using this team ability, modify that opposing character's defense value by -1 until the end of the turn. Each opposing character can't have this modifier applied more than once per turn. 

 Cada vez que una ﬁgura opuesta reciba daño de un ataque de un personaje usando este ATA, modiﬁca el valor de defensa de la ﬁgura opuesta en -1 hasta el ﬁnal del turno. Cada personaje opuesto no puede tener este modiﬁcador aplicado más de una vez por turno.

DEFENDERS
 Keyword(s): Defenders
 Cost: 4
 Characters using this team ability may replace their attack value with the unmodified attack value of an adjacent friendly character using this team ability.

ELDERS OF THE UNIVERSE
 Keyword(s):Elders of the Universe
 Cost: 5
 Opposing characters can’t attempt a relic roll while at least two friendly characters can use this team ability. 

 Los personajes opuestos no pueden intentar hacer una tirada para conseguir una reliquia mientras al menos dos personajes aliados usen esta habilidad de equipo.

FANTASTIC FORCE
Keyword(s): Fantastic Four
Cost: 5
Characters using this team ability may replace their defense value with the unmodified defense value of an adjacent friendly character using this team ability. 

 Los personajes usando esta ATA pueden reemplazar su valor de defensa con el valor de defensa sin modiﬁcar de un personaje aliado adyacente que esté usando también esta ATA. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA hace KO a un personaje enemigo, ese personaje puede curar 1 daño a cualquier personaje usando este ATA.

FEARSOME FIVE
 Keyword(s): Fearsome Five
 Cost: 3
 Characters using this team ability can use Mastermind, but may only transfer damage to friendly characters using this team ability. Uncopyable.

FF
 Keyword(s): Fantastic Four
 Cost: 3
 When a character using this team ability KO’s an opposing character, that character may heal any character using this team ability of 1 damage.

FLASHPOINT
 Keyword(s): Flashpoint
 Cost: 4
 Once per game per character using this team ability, it may use Probability Control during an adjacent friendly character's attack. When they do, you may reroll only one die and keep the other. Uncopyable. 

 Una vez por juego y por personaje usando este ATA, puede usar Control de Probabilidad durante el ataque de una ﬁgura aliada adyacente. Cuando lo hace, puede repetir unicamente un dado y mantener el otro. ATA no copiable.

GCPD
 Keyword(s): Gotham City and Police (both keywords)
 Cost: 2
 At the beginning of your turn, characters using this team ability that have no action tokens may be given a move action as a free action, with a speed value of 4.

GEN13\n Keyword(s): Gen13\n At the beginning of the game, choose a keyword for all characters using this team ability. All opposing characters with that keyword modify their attack value by -1 when a character using this team ability is targeted.

GREAT LAKES AVENGERS
Keyword(s): Great Lakes Avengers
Cost: 3
 During an attack made by a character using this team ability, opposing characters cannot use Probability Control unless a friendly character has already used Probability Control during this attack. Uncopyable. 

 Durante un ataque hecho por un personaje usando este ATA, los personajes opuestos no pueden usar Control de Probabilidad a menos que una ﬁgura aliada lo haya utilizado durante este ataque. No puede ser usada por comodines.

GREEN LANTERN HONOR GUARD
Keyword(s): Green Lantern Corps
Cost: 5
Whenever a character using this team ability attacks, modify their attack value by +1 for each other friendly character that attacked the same target this turn while using this team ability. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA realiza un ataque, modiﬁca su valor de ATK en +1 por cada otra ﬁgura aliada que haya atacado al mismo objetivo este turno, que también estuviera usando este ATA.

GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY
Keyword(s): Guardians of the Galaxy
Cost: 4
Powers possessed by characters using this team ability can't be countered. This team ability can't be used by wild cards. 

 Los poderes poseídos por los personajes que utilicen este ATA no pueden ser cancelados. Esta ATA no puede ser usada por comodines.

GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY (SILVER AGE)
Keyword(s): Guardians of the Galaxy
Cost: 1
Characters using this team ability are wild cards, but don't possess any other team abilities. Uncopyable. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA se consideran comodines, pero no poseen ningún otra habilidad de equipo. No copiable.

THE HAND
 Keyword(s): The Hand
 Cost: 7
 When it is not your turn, lines of fire to a character using this team ability are blocked if this character is adjacent to a wall or blocking terrain. 

 Fuera de tu turno, las lineas de visión marcadas a un personaje usando este ATA se consideran bloqueadas si se encuentra adyacente a un muro o a terreno bloqueado.

HELLIONS
Keyword(s): Hellions
Cost: 5
When a friendly character using this team ability is KO'd during an opponent's turn, remove an action token from another friendly character with higher point value that's using this team ability. 

 Cuando un personaje aliado usando este ATA es KO durante el turno del oponente, retira un contador de acción de otro personaje aliado con mayor puntuación y que esté utilizando este ATA.

HEROES FOR HIRE
 Keyword(s): Heroes for Hire
 Cost: 8
 At the beginning of the game, place a number of HIRED tokens on this card equal to the number of characters using this team ability. Once per turn, you may remove a HIRED token from this card and give a character using this team ability one action as a free action. Uncopyable.

HORSEMEN OF APOCALYPSE
Keyword(s): Horsemen of Apocalypse
Cost: 1
As long as you control exactly 4 characters using this team ability, modify this character's attack value by +1. Uncopyable. 

 Siempre y cuando controles cuatro personajes usando este ATA, modiﬁca el valor de ataque de este personaje en +1. No puede ser usada por Comodines.

HOWLING COMMANDOS
 Keyword(s): Howling Commandos
 Cost: 3
 Friendly characters can use Support if they can't already, but only to target a character using this team ability that took 2 or more damage from a single opponent’s attack since your last turn. 

 Los personajes aliados pueden usar Soporte si no lo tenían ya, pero solamente para hacer objetivo a un personaje que tenga esta ATA y que haya recibido 2 o más daños de un único ataque enemigo desde tu último turno.

HULKBUSTERS
 Keyword(s): Hulkbusters
 Cost: 2
 When there are more friendly characters using this team ability on the map than the total number of opposing characters, and a character using this team ability targets an opposing character with a higher point value, modify that opposing character's defense value by -1 for this attack. 

 Cuando haya más personajes aliados usando este ATA en el mapa que el total de ﬁguras opuestas, y un personaje usando este ATA esté haciendo objetivo a un personaje opuesto de mayor puntuación, modiﬁca el valor de defensa del objetivo en -1 para este ataque.

HULKED-OUT HEROES
 Keyword(s): Hulked-Out Heroes
 Cost: 5
 Characters using this team ability can use Super Strength if they are not on click #1. Uncopyable. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA pueden usar Super Fuerza si no están en el click #1. No puede ser usado por comodines.

HYDRA DEEP SCIENCE DIVISION
 Cost: 3
 Keyword(s): HYDRA
 When an opposing character uses Outwit, Perplex, or Probability Control, modify its range value by -1 for each friendly character using this team ability. Reduce the minimum range value by the same amount, but no lower than 1.

INFINITY WATCH
 Keyword(s): Infinity Watch
 Cost: 2
 When a character using this team ability rolls for a relic with the #relic# set symbol, it succeeds on a roll of 3-6. Uncopyable. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA tira el dado para coger una reliquia con símbolo #relic#, tiene éxito con una tirada de 3-6. No copiable.

INHUMANS
 Keyword(s): Inhumans
 Cost: 4
 Characters using this team ability may use the Carry ability, but only to carry characters that can also use this team ability, and may carry those characters regardless of their combat symbols. Uncopyable. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA pueden usar la habilidad de transporte, pero solo para llevar personajes que también usen este ATA, pudiendo llevarlos sin importar sus símbolos de combate. No copiable.

INTELLIGENCIA
 Keyword(s): Intelligencia 
 Cost: 3 
 If no friendly character is affected by an opponent's Outwit and/or Perplex, friendly characters that can use Outwit and/or Perplex may use them to target characters within 12 squares instead of 10 squares and all characters using this team ability modify their range values by +2. 

 Si ningún personaje aliado está afectado por Outwit y/o Perplex del enemigo, los personajes aliados que puedan usar Outwit y/o Perplex pueden hacerlo a 12 casillas en lugar de 10 y todos los personajes usando este ATA modiﬁcan su valor de rango en +2.

JUSTICE LEAGUE
 Keyword(s): Justice League
 Cost: 1
 A character using this team ability modifies its defense value by +1 when attacked by a character possessing #flight#, #sharpshooter#, #indomitable#, or #giant# combat symbols.

JUSTICE LEAGUE (SILVER AGE)
 Keyword(s): JLA, Justice League, Justice League of America 
 Cost: 4 
 Once during each game, choose any team ability or opposing character. Each friendly character using this team ability modifies its attack value by +1 when attacking the chosen character or a character possessing the chosen team ability. 

 Una vez por juego, elige una habilidad de equipo o ﬁgura oponente. Cada personaje aliado usando este ATA modiﬁca su valor de ataque en +1 cuando ataca al personaje elegido o uno que posea la habilidad de equipo escogida.

JUSTICE LEAGUE: GENERATION LOST
 Keyword(s): Justice League International
 Cost: 3
 At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character for all characters using this team ability. Characters using this team ability ignore hindering terrain when drawing a line of fire to that character.

JUSTICE LEAGUE: NEW 52
 Keyword(s): Justice League
 Cost: 3
 When a character using this team ability is adjacent to a friendly character using Leadership, add 1 to the result of the die rill, maximum 6, if not already modified by this effect.

JUSTICE LEAGUE DARK
 Keyword(s): Justice League
 Cost: 2
 When a character using this team ability is adjacent to a friendly character using this team ability, opposing characters modify their range values by -2 if not already modified by this effect. Uncopyable.

JUSTICE LEAGUE INTERNATIONAL
 Keyword(s): Justice League Antarctica, Justice League Europe, or Justice League International
 Cost: 3
 Whenever a character using this team ability would be dealt damage, you can choose to reduce damage dealt by 1 if you deal 1 unavoidable damage to a friendly character using this team ability that is adjacent to this character. (This can only be used once per damage dealt). 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA fuera a recibir daño, puedes elegir reducir el daño hecho en 1 si haces 1 daño inevitable a una ﬁgura aliada que use este ATA y esté adyacente a este personaje (Sólo puede ser usado una vez por daño sufrido).

KRYPTONIAN
 Keyword(s): Kryptonian 
 Cost: 2 
 When characters using this team ability occupy the highest level of clear, outdoor terrain and is not adjacent to blocking or hindering terrain, modify their attack values by +1. 

 Cuando personajes usando este ATA ocupan una casilla de terreno exterior, no adyacente a terreno bloqueante u obstaculizado, en la más alta posición del mapa, modiﬁca sus valores de ataque en +1

LEAGUE OF ASSASSINS
 Keyword(s): League of Assassins
 Cost: 7
 When it is not your turn, lines of fire to a character using this team ability are blocked if this character is adjacent to a wall or blocking terrain. 

 Las lineas de visión hacía una ﬁgura usando este ATA se consideran bloqueadas si el personaje se encuentra adyacente a un muro o terreno bloqueante.

LEGION LOST
 Keyword(s): Legion of Super Heroes, Legion of Super Villains 
 Cost: 4 
 Once at the beginning of the game, if no character on your force possesses a team ability that isn't a wild card team ability, choose any one DC team ability other than an additional team ability, a wild card team ability, or a team ability that can't be used by wild cards. Characters using this team ability are not wild cards and can use the chosen team ability if they can't already. 

 Al comienzo del juego, si ninguna ﬁgura de tu equipo posee una habilidad de equipo que no sea comodín, elige una habilidad de equipo de DC (excepto comodín, ATAs o habilidades no copiables). Los personajes usando este ATA no son comodines y pueden usar la habilidad elegida si no podían hacerlo previamente.

LEGION OF MONSTERS
 Keyword(s): Legion of Monsters
 Cost: 5
 Characters using this team ability can use Plasticity unless adjacent to an opposing character with the Legion of Monsters or Monster keyword.

LEGIONNAIRES
 Keyword(s): Legion of Super Heroes
 Cost: 2
 Whenever the friendly character with the highest point value that's using this team ability is KO'd, remove one action token from each other friendly character using this team ability. 

 Cada vez que una ﬁgura aliada con mayor puntos que la ﬁgura que usa este ATA sea KO, retira un contador de acción de cada otra ﬁgura aliada que use este ATA.

MARVEL KNIGHTS
 Keyword(s): Marvel Knights 
 Cost: 10 
 Characters using this team ability can use Stealth. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA pueden usar Sigilo.

MAXIMUM CARNAGE
 Keyword(s): Maximum Carnage
 Cost: 4
 When a single opposing character takes damage from an attack by a character using this team ability, after actions resolve, choose another opposing character adjacent to the first. That other character is dealt damage equal to the amount of damage taken. Uncopyable.

MIDNIGHT SONS
 Keyword(s): Midnight Sons
 Cost: 4
 Characters using this team ability can use Stealth on their starting click. If that character can already use Stealth on their starting click, lines of fire may not be drawn to that character by opposing characters while on that click.

THE MIGHTY
 Keyword(s): The Mighty
 Cost: 1
 When a character using this team ability hits an opposing character and the attack roll is double, place 1 Mighty token on this card for each 100 points of game's build total. Before any attack roll , you may remove one Mighty token from this card and modify the attacking character's attack value by -1 for this attack.

 A character using this team ability modifies their attack value by +1 when attacking a character using The Worthy additional team ability or posessing The Worthy keyword.

MIGHTY AVENGERS
 Keyword(s): Avengers
 Cost: 4
 When a character using this team ability destroys a square of blocking terrain, roll a d6 after actions resolve. On a roll of 5, you may place a standard light object in that square. On a roll of 6, you may place a standard heavy object in that square. 

 Cuando un personaje usando esta ATA destruye una casilla de terreno bloqueante, tira 1d6 después de que se resuelva la acción. En un resultado de 5, puedes colocar un objeto ligero en esa casilla. En un resultado de 6, puedes colocar un objeto pesado en esa casilla.

THE MOB\n Keyword(s): Gotham City Underworld\n Cost: 2 The highest point friendly character using this team ability can use Mastermind, but may only transfer damage to a friendly character using this team ability.

MODOK'S 11
 Keyword(s): MODOK’s 11
 Cost: 2
 Give a character using this team ability a free action to remove one object from the game. This object must be a light or heavy object in the character’s square or a square adjacent to the character. 

 Dale una acción gratuita a un personaje usando este ATA para retirar un objeto del juego. Este objeto debe ser ligero o pesado y estar en la casilla del personaje o adyacente a él.

MONSTER SOCIETY OF EVIL
Keyword(s): Injustice Society or Monster Society of Evil
 Cost: 5
At the end of your turn, you may roll a d6 for each friendly character using this team ability. On a result of 5 or 6, deal 1 damage to each opposing character adjacent to that character that hasn't already been dealt damage by this team ability this turn. 

 Al ﬁnal de tu turno, puedes tirar 1d6 por cada ﬁgura aliada que use este ATA. En un resultado de 5-6, haz 1 daño a cada ﬁgura oponente que esté adyacente a este personaje y que no haya recibido daño por este ATA durante este turno.

MORLOCKS
Keyword(s): Gene Nation or Morlocks
Cost: 2* (0 if the character possesses the Morlocks team symbol)
Whenever a character using this team ability makes a close combat attack, modify its attack value by +1 for each other character using this team ability adjacent to both this character and the target. 

 Cada vez que un personaje que use este ATA haga un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, modiﬁca su valor de ataque en +1 por cada otro personaje usando este ATA que esté adyacente tanto al atacante como a su objetivo.

 * El ATA cuesta 0 si la ﬁgura posee el símbolo de equipo Morlock

N.O.W.H.E.R.E.
 Keyword(s): N.O.W.H.E.R.E.
 Cost: 2
 Characters using this team ability that have no action tokens can use #impmov# #ignht#, #ignbt# during move actions.

NEGATIVE ZONE
Keyword(s): Negative Zone
Cost: 2
 A character using this team ability may ignore one wall or square of blocking terrain for movement purposes when it uses Charge or Running Shot. If it does and misses all target opposing characters deal this character 1 unavoidable damage after actions resolve. 

 Un personaje usando este ATA puede ignorar un muro o casilla de terreno bloqueado a efectos de movimiento cuando use Carga o Disparo a la carrera. Si lo hace y falla el ataque, el personaje recibe 1 daño inevitable después de resolver la acción.

NEW MUTANTS
Keyword(s): Generation X, New Mutants
Cost: 4
 Whenever a character using this team ability would be dealt damage, you may give an action token to an adjacent friendly character using this team ability. If you do, deal all of the damage to that character instead. 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA fuera a recibir daño, puedes poner un contador de acción en una ﬁgura aliada adyacente que use este ATA. Si lo hace, haz todo el daño a dicha ﬁgura en lugar de a la que fuera a recibir el daño.

NEW TEEN TITANS
 Keyword(s): Teen Titans
 Cost: 3
 The highest-point friendly character using this team ability can use Leadership, but may only remove action tokens from friendly characters using this team ability.

NEWER FANTASTIC FOUR
Keyword(s): Fantastic Four
Cost: 1
 A character using this team ability modifies its attack value by +1 when attacking characters possessing #indomitable#, #giant#, or #colossus#. 

 Un personaje usando este ATA modiﬁca su valor de ataque en +1 cuando ataca a ﬁguras que posean alguno de estos símbolos: #indomitable#, #giant#, or #colossus#.

NEXTWAVE
Keyword(s): Nextwave
Cost 5
When a character using this team ability KO's an opposing character of a higher point value with an attack, place this character anywhere on the map. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA hace KO a una ﬁgura opuesta de mayor puntuación con un ataque, coloca a este personaje en cualquier lugar del mapa.

NOVA CORPS
Keyword(s): Nova Corps
Cost: -10*
 Friendly characters ignore traits named "Share Through the Worldmind" possessed by friendly characters. *(0 if the character dosen't possess the trait named "Share Through the Worldmind.") 

 Los personajes aliados ignoran las habilidades llamadas “Vínculados a través del mundo mente” poseidas por otros personajes aliados.

 *0 si el personaje no posee la habilidad llamada “Vinculado a través del mundo mente”.

OFFENDERS
 Keyword(s): Offenders
 Cost: 4
 When a character using this team ability attacks a single character, replace that character's defense value with the lowest printed defense value among all characters adjacent to that character. Uncopyable.

THE ORDER
Keyword(s): Defenders
Cost: 3
 Character using this team ability cannot be targeted by an opposing character using one of the listed powers if any character using this team ability was already hit by an opposing character using that power this turn.
 Flurry Incapacitate
 Charge Penetrating/Psychic Blast
 Hypersonic Speed Ranged Combat Expert
 Running Shot Exploit Weakness
 Blades/Claws/Fangs Close Combat Expert 

 Los personajes usando este ATA no pueden ser objetivos de ﬁguras oponentes que usen algunos de los siguientes poderes si cualquier ﬁgura usando este ATA fue impactada por una ﬁgura oponente usando ese poder durante este turno.

 Flurry · Incapacitar 
 Carga · Golpe Psíquico 
 Velocidad hipersónica · Experto en combate a distancia 
 Disparo a la carrera · Explotar debilidad 
 Garras · Experto en combate cuerpo a cuerpo.

ORIGINAL SINISTER SIX
 Keyword(s): Sinister Syndicate
 Cost: 3
 When a character using this team ability hits an opposing character, mark that character with a Sinister Six token. When a character using this team ability attacks an opposing character marked with one or more Sinister Six tokens, modify their attack value by +1 for each token. When attacking a single target with one or more Sinister Six tokens, if the target's name Spider-Man or possesses the Spider-Man Family keyword or the Spider-Man symbol, modify this character's damage value by +1.

OUTLAWS
Keyword(s): Outlaws
Cost: 1
When a character using this team ability is given a move action, modify that character's speed values by +1 for each adjacent character using this team ability at the beginning of the move action. 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA realiza una acción de movimiento, modiﬁca el valor de velocidad en +1 por cada ﬁgura adyacente que este usando esta ATA al comienzo de la acción.

OUTSIDERS\n Keyword(s): Outsiders Cost: 3\n At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 for all friendly characters using this team ability. If the result is equal to or less than the number of friendly characters that can use this team ability, you may immediately give one of those characters a close combat attack as a free action, using its printed combat values. Uncopyable.

PHANTOM ZONE
 Keyword(s): Phantom Zone
 Cost: 4
Once per game per character using this team ability, when they would take 4 or more damage from an attack, you may roll a d6. On a result of 4-6, ignore the damage and place this character in your starting area. 

 Una vez por juego y por ﬁgura usando este ATA, cuando reciba 4 o más daños de un ataque, puedes tirar 1d6. En un resultado de 4-6, ignora el daño y coloca este personaje en tu área de inicio.

PRIME'S TITANS
 Keyword(s): Prime's Titans
 Cost: 6
 When a character using this team ability KO’s an opposing character, remove an action token from each other friendly character using this team ability. Uncopyable.

RAVAGERS
 Keyword(s): Ravagers
 Cost: 4
 Characters using this team ability automatically break away. Uncopyable.

REAVERS
Keyword(s): Reavers
Cost: 8
When a character using this team ability has two action tokens, it can be given a non-free action. If you do, after actions resolve deal the character 1 unavoidable damage and do not clear action tokens from it at the end of the turn. 

 Cuando un personaje utilizando este ATA tiene dos contadores de acción, puede realizar una acción no gratuita. Si lo hace, tras resolver la acción hazle 1 daño inevitable y no retires los contadores de acción al ﬁnal del turno.

RED HOOD AND THE OUTLAWS
 Keyword(s): Outlaws
 Cost: 6
 Opposing characters with the highest point value on their force can't draw lines of fire to characters using this team ability. Uncopyable.

ROGUES
 Keyword(s): Rogues 
 Cost: 6 
 Characters using this team ability can use Outwit, but only to counter Hypersonic Speed, the Move and Attack ability, or a special power that specifically allows that character to use Hypersonic Speed or the Move and Attack ability. Uncopyable. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA pueden usar Outwit, pero solamente para cancelar Velocidad Hipersónica, Mover y Atacar o un poder especial que permita usar alguno de estos dos poderes. Este ATA no puede ser copiada.

RUNAWAYS
Keyword(s): Runaways
Cost: 3
Whenever a character using this team ability attacks, modify their attack value by +1 for each other friendly character that dealt damage to an opposing character this turn while using this team ability. 

 Cada vez que un personaje que use este ATA ataque, modiﬁca su valor de ataque en +1 por cada otro personaje aliado que haya dañado a un personaje opuesto este turno que estuviera usando este ATA.

SAVAGE LAND
 Keyword(s): Savage Land
 Cost: 3
 Once per game per character using this team ability, when they roll a d6 for Blades/Claws/Fangs, if the result is a 1 that character may reroll the d6. 

 Una vez por juego y por personaje usando este ATA, cuando tire 1d6 a causa de Cuchillo/Garras/Colmillos, si es resultado es 1 puede volver a tirar el dado.

SECRET AVENGERS
 Keyword(s): Avengers
 Cost: 5
 Characters using this team ability can’t be the target of an opponent’s Outwit or Perplex unless they’ve been targeted with an attack previously in the same turn. 

 Los personajes usando este ATA no pueden ser objetivo de Outwit o Perplex del oponente amenos que hayan sido objetivos de un ataque anteriormente en el mismo turno.

SECRET INVASION
 Cost: 2
 Keyword(s): Skrulls
 When a character using this team ability is targeted with an attack by an opposing character with which it shares a keyword, modify this character’s defense value by +1.

SECRET SIX
Keyword(s): Secret Six
Cost: 3
Whenever a character using this team ability is KO'd, you may roll a d6 and subtract 2 (minimum 1). Deal that much damage, divided as you choose, among any number of opposing characters adjacent to the square the KO'd character occupied. 

 Cada vez que un personaje usando este ATA es KO, puedes tirar 1d6 y restar 2 (mínimo 1). Haz esa cantidad de daño, dividido como tu quieras, entre cualquier número de ﬁguras opuestas que estén adyacentes a la casilla ocupada por el personaje KO.

SECRET WARRIORS
 Keyword(s): Secret Warriors
 Cost: 1
 When you build your force, choose the H.A.M.M.E.R., HYDRA, or S.H.I.E.L.D. keyword. Characters using this team ability also possess the chosen keyword. Uncopyable. 

 Antes de revelar tu equipo, elige una de las tres claves: HAMMER, HYDRA o SHIELD. Los personajes que usen este ATA poseen la clave elegida. No puede ser usada por comodines.

SERPENT SOCIETY
 Keyword(s): Serpent Society or Serpent Squad
 Cost: 6* (0 if the character possesses the Serpent Society team symbol)
 Characters using this team ability can use Phasing/Teleport. 
 Los personajes usando este ATA pueden usar Fase / Teleportar.

 * El ATA cuesta 0 si el personaje posee el símbolo de equipo Serpent Society.

 Este personaje ignora la habilidad de equipo Místico.

SINISTER TWELVE
 Keyword(s): Sinister Syndicate
 Cost: 4
 When you have more characters on the map than each opponent, modify the attack value of each character using this team ability by +1.

THE SOCIETY
 Keyword(s): Secret Society of Super Villains or Society
 Cost: 3
 Whenever a character using this team ability is targeted by Outwit, you roll a d6. On a result of 4-6, the opposing character that targeted your character cannot use Outwit to target that character this turn. This team ability cannot be used by wild cards. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA es objevo de un Outwit, puedes tirar 1d6. En un resultado de 4-6, el personaje opuesto que hizo Outwit no puede usarlo sobre este personaje durante este turno. Este ATA no puede ser copiada.

SPIDER-MAN FAMILY
 Keyword(s): Spider-Man Family
 Cost: 10* (3 if the character the Spider-Man symbol)
 Characters using this team ability possess the Spider-Man team ability if they don't already, and may use the Spider-Man team ability to copy the team abilities of opposing characters as if they were friendly. Uncopyable.

SQUADRON SUPREME
 Keyword(s): Squadron Sinister or Squadron Supreme
 Cost: 5
 While at least two friendly characters using this team ability are adjacent, one of them of your choice can use Mind Control. This team ability cannot be used by wild cards. 

 Cuando el menos dos ﬁguras aliadas usando este ATA están adyacentes, una de ellas puede usar Control Mental. Esta ATA no puede ser usada por Comodines.

STRATEGIC HOMELAND INTERVENTION, ENFORCEMENT AND LOGISTICS DIVISION
 Keyword(s): S.H.I.E.L.D.
 Cost: 3
 When a friendly character using this team ability uses Outwit, Perplex, or Probability Control, modify its range value and the minimum range value for the power by +1 for each other friendly character using this team ability.

THUNDERBOLTS
 Keyword(s): Thunderbolts
 Cost: 8
 Once at the beginning of the game, choose any one Marvel team ability other than an Additional team ability, a wild card team ability, or a team ability that can't be used by wild cards. Characters using this team ability can use the chosen team ability if they can't already. 

 Al comienzo del juego, elige cualquier habilidad de equipo Marvel (Que no sea ATA, Comodin o cualquier habilidad de equipo que no pueda ser utilizada por comodines). Los personajes usando este ATA pueden usar la habilidad de equipo elegida si no la tenían ya.

U-FOES
Keyword(s): U-Foes
Cost: 3
When a character using this team ability hits an opposing character with a printed damage value of 4 or more, increase the damage dealt to that character by 1. 

 Cuando un personaje usando este ATA golpea a una ﬁgura oponente con un valor de daño impreso de 4 o más, incrementa el daño hecho a ese personaje en 1.

UNIVERSAL CHURCH OF TRUTH
Keyword(s): Universal Chruch of Truth
Cost: 4
 When an opposing character targets a character using this team ability with an attack and misses, modify the defense value of all character using this team ability by +1 until the end of the turn. 

 Cuando una ﬁgura opuesta ataque y falle a un personaje que este usando este ATA, modiﬁca el valor de defensa de todos los personajes usando esta habilidad de equipo en +1 hasta el ﬁnal del turno.

VILLAINS FOR HIRE
 Keyword(s): Villains for Hire
 Cost: 6
 Choose a copyable team ability an opposing character possesses; characters using this team ability can use that team ability for the entire game.

WHITE LANTERN CORPS
Keyword(s): White Lantern Corps
Cost: 3
Place a number of tokens on this card equal to the number of characters with the White Lantern Corps keyword with which you begin the game. Immediately before any attack roll, you may remove one token to modify a friendly character's defense value by +1. 

 Coloca un número de contadores en esta carta igual al número de ﬁguras con la clave White Lantern Corps con las que empiezas el juego. Inmediatamente antes de cualquier tirada de ataque, puedes retirar un contador para modiﬁcar la defensa de un personaje aliado en +1.

WILDC.A.T.S
 Keyword(s): Wild.C.A.T.s
 Cost: 1
 Once per turn, when a character using this team ability makes an attack roll and one of the dice is a 1, you may reroll that die. Uncopyable.

WINTER GUARD
 Keyword(s): Soviet Super-Soldiers, Winter Guard
 Cost: 1
 Each character using this team ability may be given a power action once per game to be dealt 1 unavoidable damage. If you do, after actions resolve roll a d6 and heal the character of half the result. 

 Cada personaje usando esta ATA puede realizar una acción de poder una vez por juego para recibir 1 daño inevitable. Si lo haces, tras resolver la acción tira 1d6 y cura al personaje la mitad del resultado.

THE WORTHY
 Keyword(s): the Worthy
 Cost: 1
 When a character using this team ability hits an opposing character and the attack roll is doubles, place 1 Worthy token on this card for each 100 points of the game’s build total. Before any attack roll, you may remove one Worthy token from this card and modify a target opposing character’s defense values by -1 for this attack.

 A character using this team ability modifies their attack value by +1 when attacking a character using The Mighty additional team ability or possessing The Mighty keyword.

X-FORCE
Keyword(s): X-Force
Cost: 3
Characters using this team ability ignore the effects of hindering terrain on their movement. 

 Los personajes que usen esta habilidad de equipo ignoran los efectos del terreno obstaculizado durante su movimiento.

YOUNG JUSTICE
 Keyword(s): Young Justice
 Cost: 4
 When a character using this team ability would be KO’d, you may instead turn this character to its last click but only if you deal 1 unavoidable damage to an adjacent friendly character using this team ability.
